summary: Tested Follow-up Reminders product and database filtering feature. Backend API tests (12/12 passed) and frontend UI tests completed successfully. All filter functionality works correctly including filter toggle, product/database dropdowns, filter badge, clear filters, and list updates.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/followups/filters endpoint returns 200
Backend: /api/followups/filters returns correct structure with products and databases arrays
Backend: Products in filters have correct structure (id, name)
Backend: Databases in filters have correct structure (id, name, product_id)
Backend: GET /api/followups without filters returns followups and summary
Backend: GET /api/followups with product_id filter works correctly
Backend: GET /api/followups with database_id filter works correctly
Backend: GET /api/followups with both product_id and database_id filters works
Backend: /api/followups/filters requires staff role (admin gets 403)
Backend: /api/followups requires staff role (admin gets 403)
Backend: /api/followups/filters requires authentication (401/403 without token)
Backend: /api/followups requires authentication (401/403 without token)
Frontend: Filter button appears with data-testid='toggle-filters-btn'
Frontend: Filter button toggles filters panel visibility
Frontend: Filters panel appears with data-testid='filters-panel'
Frontend: Product dropdown appears with data-testid='product-filter'
Frontend: Product dropdown has 'All Products' default option
Frontend: Database dropdown appears with data-testid='database-filter'
Frontend: Database dropdown has 'All Databases' default option
Frontend: Selecting a product updates database dropdown options
Frontend: Filter badge shows count of active filters (1 when product selected)
Frontend: Clear Filter button appears with data-testid='clear-filters-btn' when filters active
Frontend: Clear Filter button resets filters to 'all'
Frontend: Filters panel closes when toggle button clicked again
Frontend: Followups list displays correctly with filter applied
critical_code_review_comments: Code correctly uses t() translation function for all filter-related UI text
Translation keys exist in both en.js and id.js for filterByProduct, filterByDatabase, allProducts, allDatabases, noFiltersAvailable
Backend properly filters followups by product_id and database_id query parameters
Backend /followups/filters endpoint correctly aggregates unique products/databases from staff's assigned records with respond_status='ya'
context_for_next_testing_agent: Follow-up Reminders filtering feature fully tested and working. Backend endpoints /api/followups/filters and /api/followups (with product_id/database_id params) work correctly. Frontend filter UI with data-testid attributes (toggle-filters-btn, filters-panel, product-filter, database-filter, clear-filters-btn) all functional. Translations exist in both en.js and id.js for all filter-related text.
